title: CorTalk: When Hunger Meets Reward
description: Appetite, reward, and addiction are deeply intertwined with the body's hormonal state. Prof. Tony Goldstone explores how gut and pituitary hormones shape food reward, impulsivity, and addictive behaviours in obesity, genetic syndromes, and beyond. Drawing on neuroimaging, endocrinology, and clinical trials, this work points toward novel therapies for metabolic and addictive disorders.
